creditline: Gift of the Dennis Farber Trust
description: fragments of color photographs at bottom, with part of a grey car in LRC, blue barricade with "POLICE LINE DO NOT CROSS" stenciled in white at bottom left of center, with figure in a tan coat, figure in a blue coat, and figure wearing an orange hat in LLQ; vertical painterly field at top 2/3 of image, in grey and white; gold elements at bottom over photographs; received in dark, slightly distressed metal frame
medium: Acrylic on photograph mounted on canvas
signed: verso in black: UNTITLED C. 1985 / BY DENNIS FARBER
title: Untitled
